#NEXUS 
begin sptree;
(sp2:0.6,(sp3:0.3,sp4:0.3):0.3);
end;

begin genetrees;
(sp2:1.1,(sp3:0.435,sp4:0.435):0.665);
(sp2:1.266,(sp3:0.766,sp4:0.766):0.5);
(sp3:1.266,(sp2:0.766,sp4:0.766):0.5);
(sp4:1.266,(sp2:0.766,sp3:0.766):0.5);
end; 

begin traits;
set trait sp2 = -0.238
set trait sp3 = -0.696
set trait sp4 = -1.517
end;
